metadata.title: CVE-2017-9130 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The faacEncOpen function in libfaac/frame.c in Freeware Advanced AudioCoder (FAAC) 1.28 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(invalid memory read and application crash) via a crafted wav file.

criterions.comment: faac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
